name: Spaces Engine for WP Job Manager
author: Spaces Engine

sections.description:
Spaces Engine for WP Job Manager is a must-have extension to connect your SPaces with the best WordPress job board plugin.

For a full list of features, documentation, screenshots and videos, head to the plugin page.
sections.installation:
1. Go to WordPress Dashboard->Plugins->Add New
  2. Search for Spaces Engine for WP Job Manager using search option
  3. Find the plugin and click Install Now button
  4. After installation, click on Activate Plugin link to activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Where can I find answers to any questions?

We keep a fully updated FAQs on our website. Please check there first.

If your question still isn’t answered, feel free to open a support ticket via our contact form.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • [IMPROVED] Applications integration behaviour
  • [FIXED] issue with locales
  • [FIXED] issue with Space non-owners unable to create or edit jobs
  • Minor styling and translation updates

1.0.1

  • [NEW] Support for Applications Deadline add-on
  • [IMPROVED] Styling for expired listings
  • [FIXED] Issue where salary wasnâ€™t displayed for some locales
  • [FIXED] Critical error when initiating the dependency checker
  • [FIXED] Issue with job application screen toggling incorrectly
  • Minor styling updates

1.0.0

  • The start of it all

short_description: Spaces Engine for WP Job Manager allows your Space administrators to post jobs inside their Spaces.
